resources.string: Women, an integral part of our socienty, are facing numerous challenges with respect to their safety and dignity. We have come together to build an application, to make them feel more secure. Using this appication, you would be able to inform your near ones regarding any danger that you might be facing
Select your emergency contacts, to whom you would like to send a help message in case of danger. Please provide us the permission to access the contacts for the same.
To be able to send text messages, we require to read the your phone\'s current state. Please provide us the permission for the same.
When you are in danger, we would be sending a SMS with your location to your selected emergency contacts. Please provide us with the SMS access for the same in the next screen.
We need to access the device location to send it to your emergency contacts when you are in danger. Please provide us the Location access for the same in the next screen.
Quickly access your default camera application with a press of a button
Send your GPS Location (Latitude, Longitude) in the Help Message. Receiver would then be able to view your location in Google Maps.
Please help me, I am in danger and require your help.
Show/Hide a button to launch camera quickly.
Reset your current emergency contacts, and start afresh.
